channel.title: Changing Level requirements for items
channel.description: I was wondering how do I Change the Level requirements for weapons, and amour.

item.title: Changing Level requirements for items
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

Open client.java and search

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

Then scroll down a bit till you see

if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; }

Then simply change the return numbers. Scroll down a bit more and you can do the same for defense or strength.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Level requirements for items
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

attack - public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

defence - public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {

magic - public int GetCLMagic(int ItemID) {

ranged - public int GetCLRanged(int ItemID) {

strength - public int GetCLStrength(int ItemID) {

and add your item requirements in thoose intâ€™s
